enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: Delegates met informally in the morning, afternoon and evening to consider Co-Chairs' draft Terms of Reference for EGTT and draft conclusions.
Negotiations were stalled in the morning on whether EGTT should 'be requested' or 'consider' the proposed tasks.
Delegates considered EGTT tasks paragraph-by-paragraph in the afternoon, without reaching agreement.
Contentious issues included the evaluation of COP decisions since COP 1, the assessment of implementation of the framework, and who should take action for the involvement of the private sector.
